en.<b>Laden Sie nur Medien hoch, an denen S:
Only upload media that you have the right to use!
According to §60 UrhG, only a maximum of 5-minute sequences from copyrighted Films or music recordings are allowed to be made available, provided these make up a small extent of the overall work. §60 UrhG summary
Media found to be in breach of copyright will be deleted immediately without prior notice.
en.Alle Inhalte in weitere Kurse übertragen: Transfer all content to other courses
en.Auf diese Liste kann jede Person zugreif: Anyone can access this list and the list may also be visible on external platforms.
Any person who knows the associated sharing link can access this list

This video is not visible for the participants of this course!

en.Ihr Video wird nun verarbeitet. Sie erha: Your video will now be processed. You will receive a notification once the processing is complete.
en.Jeder Capture-Agent kann nur maximal ein: Every capture agent can only be assigned to one room maximum!
en.Mindestens ein Video wird benötigt. Unte:
At least one video is required. Supported formats are
                                 .mkv, .avi, .mp4, .mpeg, .webm, .mov, .ogv, .ogg, .flv, .f4v,
                                 .wmv, .asf, .mpg, .mpeg, .ts, .3gp and .3g2

Are you sure you want to remove this video from the playlist?

en.Überprüfung der LTI Verbindung fehlgesch: LTI connection verification failed! Check the entered data and make sure that cross-origin calls from this domain are possible! Also remember to set the correct access-control-allow-* headers in Opencast.
e.g. sound or playback problems etc.
en.Zeitpuffer (in Sekunden) um Überlappunge: Time buffer (in seconds) to prevent overlapping
en.Das Video wurde zur Löschung markiert un: The video has been marked for deletion and therefore cannot be retrieved
en.Das Plugin benötigt die \"Nobody\"-Rolle: The plugin requires the "Nobody" role to allow Opencast to retrieve user permissions. However, this role has not yet been assigned, so the plugin currently only has limited functionality.
en.Opencast: Aktualisiert alle geplanten Au: Opencast: Updates all scheduled recordings of series connected in Stud.IP and deletes obsolete scheduled events.
en.Lösche nicht über Stud.IP Termine geplan: Deleting events not scheduled with Stud.IP:

en.Opencast: Katalogisiert neue Videos aus: Opencast: Catalogs new videos from Opencast.
en.Opencast - Zum löschen markierte Videos: Opencast - Permanently delete videos marked for deletion
en.Opencast: Löscht die zur endgültigen Lös: Opencast: Deletes the videos intended for permanent deletion from the users' deleted videos.
en.Opencast: Arbeitet vorgemerkte Aufgaben: Opencast: Processes scheduled tasks, such as updating metadata, ACLs (visibility), etc.
en.Stellt eine Aufzeichnung aus dem Opencas: Provides a recording from the Opencast plugin

This date is in the past. You cannot schedule a recording.

en.Die Kurs-Verknüpfungen der Wiedergabelis: The course connections for the playlist could not be updated!!

The video's playlist links could not be updated!

en.Fehlerhafte Zugangsdaten für die Opencas: Wrong authentication data for Opencast "%s". Please check your settings.
en.Es wurden keine Endpoints für die Openca: No endpoints were found for the Opencast installation with the URL "%s". Please check the entered data, also pay attention to http vs https and whether your Opencast installation supports https.
Could not retrieve endpoints for Opencast installation with URL "%s". Please check the entered data.
en.Capture Agent für (%s) konnte nicht gesp: Capture Agent for (%s) could not be saved!
en.Mit diesem Tool können Videos aus dem Vo: With this tool, videos from the lecture recording system (Opencast) can be displayed in a Stud.IP course. The videos can be added from the event's own video area, uploaded directly to the course or created directly using the online tool Opencast Studio. Complete playlists can also be connected to courses.
en.Darüberhinaus ist es mit dieser Integrat: In addition, with this integration it is possible to completely manage the recording schedule for a course. This requires appropriate entries in the schedule and a booked resource with an Opencast capture agent.
